___matchedActions.description: List of transformations that matched the event.

___targetAndType.description: If true, the action target and action type are used to produce the action for the event.

___transformationIndex.description: The index of the transformation that matches in the transformations rule.

___actionBody.description: The event after the transformation was applied. If no transformation function present, the event is returned as it is.

___matchedConditions.description: List of conditions that matched the event.

___conditionIndex.description: The index of the condition that matches in the conditions rule.

___type.description: If true, the event type was used to match the event.

___function.description: If true, the function was used to match the event.

___source.description: If true, the event source was used to match the event.
